verses.verse: Geue praise not vnto vs O God, not vnto vs, but vnto thy name: for thy louing mercy, and for thy truethes sake.
Wherfore shal the Heathen say: where is nowe their God?
Truely our Lorde is in heauen: he hath done whatsoeuer pleased him.
Their idols are siluer and gold: euen the workes of mens handes.
They haue a mouth and speake not: they haue eyes and see not.
They haue eares and heare not: they haue noses and smell not.
They haue handes and handle not, they haue feete and walke not: and they vtter no sounde out of their throtes.
They that make them are lyke vnto them: euery one that putteth his trust in them.
But Israel trust thou in God: he is their ayde and their shielde.
Ye house of Aaron trust you in God: he is their ayde and their shielde.
Ye that feare God, trust ye in God: he is their ayde and their shielde.
God hath ben myndfull of vs, he wyll blesse vs: he wyll blesse the house of Israel, he wyll blesse the house of Aaron.
He wyll blesse those that feare God: the small with the great.
God wyll encrease you more and more: both you and also your children.
Ye are the blessed of God: which made heauen and earth.
The heauen, the heauen [I say] is Gods: and he hath geuen the earth vnto the children of men.
The dead prayse not thee O Lorde: neither all they that go downe into the [place] of scilence.
But we wyll prayse the Lord: from this tyme foorth for euermore. Prayse ye the Lorde.
